summary: Project to update the app UI to remove transparency (solid white dialogs/menus) and address reported connection failures.
known_issues: Users may encounter an 'Unable to connect' / 'issue connecting with the application' error when trying to access the app.

existing_features.title: Ensure all pop-up dialog panels render with a fully opaque solid white background (no transparency, no blur/"glass" effect), including all modal forms (e.g., Profile Setup, Add/Edit Resident, Add/Edit Medication, Add MAR/ADL/Vitals).

Ensure all dropdown menus and selection menus render with a fully opaque solid white background (no transparency) for the menu surface, including Select menus and any dropdown/popover-style menus used across the app.

Add/adjust global styling safeguards so that any future dialog/dropdown/select/popover surfaces cannot become transparent due to theme alpha values or component defaults, without modifying any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (read-only).

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove all UI transparencies; make pop-up dialogs, dropdown menus, and selection menus solid white.

projectName: Remove transparency from dialogs, dropdowns, and selection menus (solid white surfaces)
